feed.title: The Tiger’s Lair
feed.subtitle: The official website of Le Tigre.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Hello World! This is my very first blog post. I am a musician, blogger, designer and developer from Vienna, Austria. There are many things I like to do and explore. So if there is anything I really want to talk about, then this is the place you should look, if you want to know about it. If I experience anything bloody amazing I’ll also write something about it here. Furthermore, I will also use this website as a place to publish my projects, mixtapes and designs.
entry.summary: Hello World! This is my very first blog post. I am a musician, blogger, designer and developer from Vienna, Austria. There are many things I like to do and explore. So if there is anything I really want to talk about, then this is the place you should look, if you want to know about it. If I experience anything bloody amazing I’ll also write something about it here. Furthermore, I will also use this website as a place to publish my projects, mixtapes and designs.
